tswitem.name: Advanced Kickback - Hit
tswitem.tooltip:
Advanced Kickback - Hit
Gadget (QL 10 Epic)
Character Bound
Kickback: For 20 seconds, whenever you hit you have a 30% chance to gain
1: 464 Hit Rating
2: 464 Block Rating
3: 464 Critical Rating
4: 464 Critical Power Rating
5: 464 Defence Rating
6: 503 Evade Rating
7: 290 Physical and Magical Protection
8: 464 Penetration Rating
for 4 seconds. Applies a 2 minute cooldown to all Kickbacks.
